name: Makers • From Figma to Site
description:
Makers is a website builder inside Figma.


Click a button and publish your design to a custom domain.


Demo

Here's a quick demo of the Makers Plugin in action.


How it works

I want to say it as early as possible: you have to design using our built-in components. I know, I know, you have to duplicate your work if you already have a design. But the extra work is to guarantee the best output possible!


Why? Well, it's the most reliable way to understand what you are designing: is it a navigation bar, or a button, or an input? By using the built in components you are telling us what to convert them to 🙂


How to get started?

  1. Install the Plugin
  2. Select the components you want to use
  3. Customize at your own will
  4. Click "Preview" to open it in the browser (you have to create a Makers account*)
  5. Whenever you are ready: Publish it 🚀


Why do I have to create an account?

To save your sites securely. When you Preview a design within the Makers Plugin you are already creating a website that you can share with your friends, colleagues or mom 😍


The most secure way to know the site is yours is by associating it with an account. You get this, right?


What you can easily build:

  • Landing Pages
  • Portfolio / Personal sites
  • Blogging
  • Careers / Wiki sites

Why I build Makers:

As a front-end developer I've converted hundreds of Figma designs into code. My clients are usually busy startups or web agencies wanted to speed up their workflow.


However the ability to automatically publish Figma designs into a custom domain (without going to an engineer and "design to code") is something that would benefit all the community. Specially for simple projects.
